The [[Kurosuki Family]] members pile up one on top of the other, five in one pillar, and then send out their gloves' retractable blades and hold out their arms. They then proceed to spin, creating a black tornado-looking attack. The speed makes the attack so powerful that the blades can easily cut through stone.
